# Test: grove move fails when branch exists on remote
setup_workspace

# Create branch in origin repo
exec git -C $WORK/testrepo checkout -b remote-only-branch
exec git -C $WORK/testrepo checkout main

# Fetch to create remote tracking branch
exec git fetch origin remote-only-branch:refs/remotes/origin/remote-only-branch

exec grove add local-to-remote
! exec grove move local-to-remote remote-only-branch
stderr 'âœ— branch.*already exists'
